def give_last(arr):
    last_value = arr[0]
    g = 0
    while g < len(arr):
        last_value = arr[g]
        g += 1
    return last_value

def give_first(arr):
    first_value = arr[-1]
    g = len(arr)
    while g > 0:
        g -= 1
        first_value = arr[g]
    return first_value
